title: Day 8 - Learned about animations, chess, Angular and insurance
content:
• Today I figured out the physics part of the animation. It involved some tinkering with the default values. The animation works fine now. I have another idea about looping animation which I will execute in the coming days.
  • Today I played some casual games just for fun and many learnings stuck with me from the analyzing part of chess games.
  • Today I completed the Angular course by CodeWithHarry and made a to-do list website. It was a smooth and easy ride learning this new topic.
  • I watched the fifth episode of Understanding Insurance and learned about auto insurance. It helped me understand the why, how, and when of auto insurance. It cleared most of the misconceptions around auto insurance and educated me about important points to take into consideration which buying auto insurance.
author: Aarush Popli
